original: bsdus pa de 'dir mthong ba'i lam //
analyzed: bsdus pa de 'dir mthong ba'i lam //
translated: included in that is the path of seeing.

original: zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught by the following:

original: gang rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gang rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subh≈´ti, here when bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas give a gift,

original: rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: they give the gift while dedicating it to omniscience.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
translated: and complete the six perfections.

original: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
translated: Thus, from the perfection of generosity

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i bar du drug po re re zhing drug tu byas nas rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug gis bsdus pa thams cad du 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir thams cad
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i bar du drug po re re zhing drug tu byas nas rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug gis bsdus pa thams cad du 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir thams cad
translated: In this way, each of the six pƒÅramitƒÅs is divided into six, making thirty six aspects, which are all included in the main dedication, which is the complete purity of the three spheres.üîΩüîΩ

original: gcig gis gcig bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig gis gcig bsdus pa yin no //
translated: All of them are included in each other, because they are included in the six each divided into six, up to the perfection of wisdom, and in all of them, the dedication that is the chief of all dedications is the complete purity of the three spheres.

original: 'di'i mdo ni /
analyzed: 'di'i mdo ni /
translated: The sutra says,

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba ni sems can rnams la byams pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las nye bar 'gyur ba ni tshul khrims @142b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba ni sems can rnams la byams pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las nye bar 'gyur ba ni tshul khrims @142b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Subhuti, here, when the bodhisattva mahasattva gives a gift, it is the perfection of morality that his physical, verbal, and mental actions are imbued with love for sentient beings.

original: de nyid la len pa po rnam par gshe zhing 'khyal bar smra ba la sogs pa bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la len pa po rnam par gshe zhing 'khyal bar smra ba la sogs pa bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: It is the perfection of patience that he is patient with those who scold, insult, and so on, right with those very sentient beings.

original: de nyid kyi slong mo'i mtshang 'dru ba dang // yongs su smra ba la sogs pas sbyin pa la spro ba mi 'dor ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩde nyid kyi sbyin pa de rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing /
analyzed: de nyid kyi slong mo'i mtshang 'dru ba dang // yongs su smra ba la sogs pas sbyin pa la spro ba mi 'dor ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // de nyid kyi sbyin pa de rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing /
translated: The perfection of effort is the non-abandonment of the enthusiasm for generosity by means of the investigation of the faults of begging and the complete expression of speech, etc.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rnam par g-yengs pa'i sems med pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rnam par g-yengs pa'i sems med pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the dedication of that generosity to omniscience by means of that very generosity, and the absence of a distracted mind in the stages of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: de nyid kyi sbyin pa byin pa na sgyu ma'i blos gnas pas gang gi yang phan pa dang ; gnod par bya ba ma mthong ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi sbyin pa byin pa na sgyu ma'i blos gnas pas gang gi yang phan pa dang ; gnod par bya ba ma mthong ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the non-perception of any benefit or harm to anyone by means of that very generosity, by abiding in the illusory mind.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung ba nas shes rab bsgom pa'i bar du re re zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par bsdus pa mdo ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung ba nas shes rab bsgom pa'i bar du re re zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par bsdus pa mdo ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should explain each of the perfections, from the observance of morality up to the cultivation of wisdom, as being included in the complete fulfillment of the six perfections, according to the sutras.

original: de ltar na drug tshan cha drug po 'di dag ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na drug tshan cha drug po 'di dag ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, these six sets of six are the thirty six aspects.

original: mthong ba'i lam gyi bzod pa 'di skyes pa na 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyis bsdus pa'i nyon mongs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam par rtog pa bzhis bsdus pa brgya rtsa brgyad spong bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam gyi bzod pa 'di skyes pa na 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyis bsdus pa'i nyon mongs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam par rtog pa bzhis bsdus pa brgya rtsa brgyad spong bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: When this acceptance of the path of seeing arises, one abandons the one hundred and eight afflictions of the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm, which are subsumed by the four types of conceptuality.

original: / de la dbang du bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: / de la dbang du bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
translated: In order to master that, one enters into the meditative absorption of equipoise.

original: de nas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
analyzed: de nas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
translated: Then, having entered into the meditative absorption of the lion's display,

original: rten cing 'brel 'byung lugs mthun dang // lugs mi mthun la rtog gar byed //üîΩces bstan pa la /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel 'byung lugs mthun dang // lugs mi mthun la rtog gar byed // ces bstan pa la /
translated: one engages in the analysis of the forward and reverse sequences of dependent origination.

original: de la lugs dang mthun pa ni /
analyzed: de la lugs dang mthun pa ni /
translated: In this regard, the forward sequence is

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: the condition of ignorance gives rise to compositional activity, and so forth.üîΩThe reverse sequence is

original: lugs dang mi mthun pa ni gang de rnams med pas /
analyzed: lugs dang mi mthun pa ni gang de rnams med pas /
translated: if that does not exist, this does not exist, and so forth.

original: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: there is no sorrow, lamentation, etc.

original: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the chapter on the peak realization.

original: // / mthong ba'i lam bstan nas /
analyzed: // / mthong ba'i lam bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the path of seeing,

original: da ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa bzhi brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa bzhi brjod par bya'o //
translated: now, the four conceptual thoughts that are the counteragents to the path of cultivation should be stated.

original: de la re zhig bsgom pa'i lam bsgoms nas 'di phyir brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la re zhig bsgom pa'i lam bsgoms nas 'di phyir brjod par bya'o //
translated: Among them, first, having cultivated the path of cultivation, this is to be stated.

original: bsgom pa'i lam @143a * //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam @143a * //
translated: The path of cultivation

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus bsdus pa yin la /
translated: is included in the nine serial absorptions.

original: de yang thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pas bsdus pa yin pas de'i phyir de bstan pa'i sgo nas bsgom pa'i lam mdor bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad de /üîΩ'gog dang bcas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgur //
analyzed: de yang thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pas bsdus pa yin pas de'i phyir de bstan pa'i sgo nas bsgom pa'i lam mdor bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad de / 'gog dang bcas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgur //
translated: Moreover, since that is included in the alternating absorptions, therefore, from the perspective of teaching that, the path of cultivation is briefly indicated.üîΩHaving gone and returned in two ways

original: rnam pa gnyis su song 'ongs nas //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su song 'ongs nas //
translated: in the nine absorptions with cessation,

original: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes //
analyzed: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes //
translated: the consciousness belonging to the desire realm

original: mnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
translated: The meditative attainment of forward and reverse order is taught in the Abhidharma:

original: thod rgal du ni snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: thod rgal du ni snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: The meditative attainment of forward and reverse order

original: gcig dang gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga //
analyzed: gcig dang gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga //
translated: is one, two, three, four, five,

original: drug dang bdun dang brgyad rgal nas //
analyzed: drug dang bdun dang brgyad rgal nas //

analyzed: 'gog pa'i bar du mi 'drar 'gro // zhes bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'o //

original: de nas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas /
analyzed: de nas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas /
